DOC.brief_summary: This multi-institution , non-randomized , prospective pilot study evaluate feasibility collecting quality life ( QOL ) data large cohort pediatric adult allogeneic Hematopoietic stem cell transplantation ( HCT ) recipient .
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Collecting Quality Life Data Collaboration With Stem Cell Therapeutic Outcomes Database
DOC.detailed_description: QOL data collect baseline ( pre-transplant ) , 100 day , 6 month , 12 month post transplant . The transplant center consent patient administer baseline QOL survey . The transplant center submit compete baseline data patient contact information Center International Blood Marrow Transplant Research ( CIBMTR ) . The remain survey administer patient CIBMTR via paper survey mail patient .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Adult ( ≥ 18 year ) , pediatric ( ≥ 2 year < 18 year ) allogeneic HCT recipient ( relate , unrelated , CBU ) participate pilot study transplant center . 2 . Signed informed consent form adult patient parent/guardian pediatric patient . 3 . Patient must valid mailing address within United States receive QOL survey . 4 . Ability speak read English . 5 . Patients access telephone .
